options.content:
Use Explore with the Tempo datasource to search traces for `service.name=core-server` or `service.name=node-agent`.

Recommended TraceQL examples:
- `{ service.name = "core-server" }`
- `{ service.name = "node-agent" }`

If no traces appear, confirm the collector is running and `CORE_OTEL_ENABLED` / `NODE_OTEL_ENABLED` are set.
